channel.title: Comments for page "Ol' Whitey"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ol' Whitey"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: At first I was going to point that out, but then remembered some people choose whiteeye as season 1.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: to get "Team WhiteEye Bonus!" is imposible, coz if you whana get ol'whitey, you have to complete "Jonin Ascension" as whiteEye ninja, but if you whana to vompleet this quest, you must to have crazy love triangle team, wich contains already Lv2 stalkegirl, but for "Team WhiteEye Bonus!" you need stalkegirl Lv1.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: plus Ol'Whitey could also refer to Neji's Father just like Big Shammy, Big Bo, and Big Ro.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I think you're right, and that'd make more sense during the Jonin exam in BvS.

item.title: Ol' Whitey reference
item.content:encoded: The page says it is a reference to Hyuuga Hiashi, but in the picture Ol' Whitey has a seal (or at least a symbol) on his forehead, since Hyuuga Hiashi was a main branch member and as such had no "caged bird seal" the reference is to Hyuuga Hizashi, Negi's father, and branch family brother of Hyuuga Hiashi.
